snippet: Another report showed that business activity growth in the Midwest decelerated slightly in September.
abstract: Conference Board reports that its consumer confidence index fell to 86.0 in September from upwardly revised 93.4 in August; business activity growth in Midwest decelerated slightly.
lead_paragraph: Another report showed that business activity growth in the Midwest decelerated slightly in September.

headline.main: Consumer Confidence Falls, as U.S. Economy Hits Bump
headline.print_headline: Consumer Confidence Falls, as U.S. Economy Hits Bump
